Magical events to entertain your children at Suffolk Libraries this half-term

Written by Alice Violett · Published Feb 9, 2017

Wondering what to do with your children this February half-term? We're holding events for children across our libraries, many with a magical theme.

Some Presents screenings are also taking place in half-term. Hadleigh Library are showing York Theatre Royal's production of The Railway Children on Wednesday 15 February, while Felixstowe Library's screening of Twelfth Night on Friday 17 February may be of interest to older children who are studying Shakespeare at school.

For a full list of half-term activities for children, please see below.

Capel Creators Lego club

Sat 28 Oct 1030 – 1230
Capel St Mary Library

Halloween disco

Fri 27 Oct 1730 – 1930
Chantry Library

Kinetic Adventure: Lab in a Library Mini Experiments workshop for 5-8 year-olds

Thu 26 Oct 1030 – 1230
Clare Library

Kinetic Adventure: Lab in a Library Crime Scene Investigation workshop for 9-12 year-olds

Thu 26 Oct 1330 – 1530
Clare Library

Halloween crafts for 4-11 year-olds

Fri 27 Oct 1400 – 1600
Great Cornard Library

Halesworth Library
